name: Karyo Bio Fertilizer
shortDescription: Consortium biofertilizer supporting nutrient uptake and soil vitality.
fullDescription: Karyo delivers a balanced microbial consortium that enhances root vigor, nutrient solubilization, and crop resilience across cereals, pulses, and horticulture.

name: Wynn Enzyme Blend
shortDescription: High-activity enzyme complex for efficient bioprocessing.
fullDescription: Wynn optimizes fermentation cycles, improves substrate conversion, and lowers energy loads in food and feed manufacturing lines.

name: Probiotic Premix
shortDescription: Stabilized probiotic formulation for capsules and sachets.
fullDescription: Multi-strain probiotic premix manufactured under controlled conditions to deliver reliable CFU counts for nutraceutical brands.
